title: Advise on a 1031 Exchange
description: A real estate investor is selling an investment property and wants to defer capital gains tax by acquiring a like-kind property in a 1031 exchange.

tasks.description: Explain the strict rules and timelines for a 1031 exchange (e.g., 45-day identification period, 180-day closing period).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the critical deadlines.

tasks.description: Advise the client on the need for a qualified intermediary to facilitate the exchange.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains the role of the intermediary and recommends finding one.

tasks.description: Review potential replacement properties to ensure they meet the 'like-kind' requirement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent helps the client ensure the transaction will qualify for tax deferral.
